title: Cycling Horoscopes for the Week of Feb 14-21: How To Survive Lent and Thrive on Valentine’s Day
content:
An unprofessional and cycling-specific analysis of your weekly horoscopes, Valentine's Day and Lent edition.

Read the full article at Cycling Horoscopes for the Week of Feb 14-21: How To Survive Lent and Thrive on Valentine’s Day on Velo.
author: Brad Roe
